input: Send a batch request to retrieve and update the same prenote entry's validity end date.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/55555555-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/66666666-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1

PATCH /BankAccountPrenoteEntries/55555555-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01/66666666-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"ValidityEndDate": "2025-12-31"}

--request-separator--
